titles.title: To authorize salary adjustments for Justices and judges of the United States for fiscal year 2005.
To authorize salary adjustments for Justices and judges of the United States for fiscal year 2005.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Mr. Sensenbrenner moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 5363.
DEBATE - The House resumed debate on H.R. 5363.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate, read twice.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Authorizes U.S. justices and judges to receive a salary adjustment during FY 2005 (in accordance with specified Federal judicial code provisions).
